subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the Funnel UI component's contents, behavior and appearance.

subMembers.name: adaptiveLayout
subMembers.description: Specifies adaptive layout properties.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum container height at which the layout begins to adapt.

subMembers.name: keepLabels
subMembers.description: Specifies whether [item labels] should be kept when the UI component adapts the layout.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum container width at which the layout begins to adapt.

subMembers.name: algorithm
subMembers.description: Specifies the algorithm for building the funnel.

subMembers.name: argumentField
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field provides arguments for funnel items. The argument identifies a funnel item and represents it on the [legend].

subMembers.name: colorField
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field provides colors for funnel items. If this field is absent, the [palette] provides the colors.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | String | Array<any> | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: hoverEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether funnel items change their style when a user pauses on them.

subMembers.name: inverted
subMembers.description: Turns the funnel upside down.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures a funnel item's border.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors a funnel item's border.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Makes a funnel item's border visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets the width of a funnel item's border in pixels.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures a funnel item's border appearance when a user presses the item or hovers the mouse pointer over it.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors a funnel item's border when a user presses the item or hovers the mouse pointer over it.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Shows a funnel item's border when a user presses the item or hovers the mouse pointer over it.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Thickens a funnel item's border when a user presses the item or hovers the mouse pointer over it.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching line direction.

subMembers.name: hatching
subMembers.description: Applies hatching to a funnel item when a user presses the item or hovers the mouse pointer over it.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency of hatching lines.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between two side-by-side hatching lines in pixels.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching lines' width in pixels.

subMembers.name: hoverStyle
subMembers.description: Configures a funnel item's appearance when a user presses the item or hovers the mouse pointer over it.

subMembers.name: item
subMembers.description: Configures funnel items' appearance.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures a funnel item's border appearance when a user selects this item.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the selected funnel item's border.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Shows the selected funnel item's border.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Thickens the selected funnel item's border.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching line direction.

subMembers.name: hatching
subMembers.description: Applies hatching to a selected funnel item.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching line transparency.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between two side-by-side hatching lines in pixels.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies hatching line width in pixels.

subMembers.name: selectionStyle
subMembers.description: Configures a funnel item's appearance when a user selects it.

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Colors the labels' background. The default color is inherited from the funnel items.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the label borders.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the label borders.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Sets the label border dash style.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Shows the label borders.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the label border width.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors label connectors.

subMembers.name: connector
subMembers.description: Configures label connectors.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency of label connectors.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Shows label connectors.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the label connector width in pixels.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes labels' text.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies labels' font properties.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats the item value before displaying it in the label.

subMembers.name: horizontalAlignment
subMembers.description: Specifies labels' position in relation to the funnel items.

subMembers.name: horizontalOffset
subMembers.description: Moves labels from their initial positions.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Configures funnel item labels.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display labels inside or outside funnel items or arrange them in columns.

subMembers.name: showForZeroValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show labels for items with zero value.

subMembers.name: textOverflow
subMembers.description: Specifies what to do with label texts that overflow the allocated space after applying [wordWrap]: hide, truncate them and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Controls the labels' visibility.

subMembers.name: wordWrap
subMembers.description: Specifies how to wrap label texts if they do not fit into a single line.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a legend item.

subMembers.name: customizeItems
subMembers.description: Allows you to change the order, text, and visibility of legend items.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text displayed by legend items.

subMembers.name: legend
subMembers.description: Configures the legend.

subMembers.name: markerComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [markerTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: markerRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [markerTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: markerTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies an SVG element that serves as a custom legend item marker.

subMembers.name: neckHeight
subMembers.description: Specifies the ratio between the height of the neck and that of the whole funnel. Accepts values from 0 to 1. Applies only if the [algorithm] is *"dynamicHeight"*.

subMembers.name: neckWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the ratio between the width of the neck and that of the whole funnel. Accepts values from 0 to 1. Applies only if the [algorithm] is *"dynamicHeight"*.

subMembers.name: palette
subMembers.description: Sets the palette to be used to colorize funnel items.

subMembers.name: paletteExtensionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what to do with colors in the [palette] when their number is less than the number of funnel items.

subMembers.name: resolveLabelOverlapping
subMembers.description: Specifies how [item labels] should behave when they overlap.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a single or multiple funnel items can be in the selected state at a time. Assigning *"none"* disables the selection feature.

subMembers.name: sortData
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to sort funnel items.

subMembers.name: contentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

subMembers.name: customizeTooltip
subMembers.description: Customizes a specific tooltip's appearance.

subMembers.name: valueField
subMembers.description: Specifies which data source field provides values for funnel items. The value defines a funnel item's area.

subMembers.name: Fields
subMembers.description: Fields that provide information on the funnel item.

subMembers.name: argument
subMembers.description: The item's argument.

subMembers.name: data
subMembers.description: The item's original data object.

subMembers.name: percent
subMembers.description: The item's calculated percentage value.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: The item's value.

subMembers.name: Item
subMembers.description: This section describes the **Item** object, which represents a funnel item.

subMembers.name: FunnelLegendItem
subMembers.description: An object that provides information about a legend item in the [Funnel] UI component.

subMembers.name: item
subMembers.description: The funnel item that the legend item represents.

subMembers.name: Interfaces
subMembers.description: This section describes interfaces that the {WidgetName} component uses.

properties.name: dxFunnel
properties.description: The Funnel is a UI component that visualizes a value at different stages. It helps assess value changes throughout these stages and identify potential issues. The Funnel UI component conveys information using different interactive elements ([tooltips], [labels], [legend]) and enables you to create not only a [funnel], but also a [pyramid chart].

Methods.name: clearSelection()
Methods.description: Cancels the selection of all funnel items.

Methods.name: getAllItems()
Methods.description: Provides access to all funnel items.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDrawn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: onExported
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onFileSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: onHoverChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a [funnel item].

Events.name: onIncidentOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a [funnel item] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onLegendClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a [legend item] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a funnel item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: hoverChanged
Events.description: Raised after the pointer enters or leaves a [funnel item].

Events.name: itemClick
Events.description: Raised when a [funnel item] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: legendClick
Events.description: Raised when a [legend item] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: selectionChanged
Events.description: Raised when a funnel item is selected or selection is canceled.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DrawnEvent
Types.description: The type of the [drawn] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exported] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exporting] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FileSavingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [fileSaving] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FunnelAlgorithm
Types.description: Specifies the algorithm for building the funnel.

Types.name: HoverChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hoverChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: IncidentOccurredEvent
Types.description: The type of the [incidentOccurred] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: Legend
subMembers.description: Configures the legend.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a legend item.

subMembers.name: customizeItems
subMembers.description: Allows you to change the order, text, and visibility of legend items.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text displayed by legend items.

subMembers.name: markerTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies an SVG element that serves as a custom legend item marker.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the legend is visible.

Types.name: LegendClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [legendClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

subMembers.name: customizeTooltip
subMembers.description: Customizes a specific tooltip's appearance.
